reviews.review: 아니 시발 최적화좀 해줘라 8G에 1650슈퍼 쓰는데 ㅅㅂ  데바데만 하는데 프레임이 4~5프레임 나오고 3달만인가 데버데 하면 나는 쟂빛4인데 잡히는거는 빨랭이냐 빨랭 가본적도 없는데 매튜 ㅅㅂ아 일좀해라
I hate this game so much... but it's so good

Let's be honest, we've all dreamed of living the life in a horror movie, now you can! Dead by Daylight is a game where you survive and escape from the monsters, or control as your favorite serial killer and slay everyone to win. This game will put you on a thrilling ride, with heart-blood pumping action, and plays with your mind.

The only issue I have is finding a match-made game but that's all part of the server failing to connect you, sometimes. Overall, this is a great multiplayer game, don't play alone.
Gosto muito desse jogo, não recomendo se você gosta de um jogo com hits precisos, agora se prefere uma jogabilidade roubada, sem lógica alguma e com uma comunidade tóxica, super recomendo, é babado!
對新手比較不友善，尤其是殺手的部分。前期需要耐心培養，等練到30等候才會比較順
Fun for the first 200 hours then gets a little stale. Then you come back to it after a couple months and have fun again. Best played with friends.
очень рекомендую, для игры с друзьяшками :з
It's too late for me now...

i think we did petty good job so far
haha

I really wish this game had a campaign or offline mode because I feel like I wasted my money buying this game when it is only multiplayer and the matchmaking cannot seem to find any players at all. You spend the majority of time waiting in a lobby as a survivor and a killer and have insane wait times, even with expanded search on for cross plat. It confuses me whether or not the matchmaking is bad or there is just no one that plays this game. I cant say I had a lot of game time because I simply was not going to wait at most 30 mins to find a game that will either be half empty with 2 survivors or not have a killer at all which just becomes a generator speed run. I wish I could have played more of this game.

fun spoopy game
good for betraying friends

this game sucks, but is addicting. Its like doing coke

juego entretenido con muchas formas de jugarlo muy entretenido la verdad y mejor si juegas con amigos 
contra : puede que te toquen asesinos camperos y tuneleros , aparte que no hay servidores en latinoamerica asi que el ping es un poco molesto pero jugable , y si juegas como asesino puede que te tocan gen rusheros y t bagers molestos pero lo demas ok
Finding a game that has both the potential to play as a single player and 4 player game is rare. What is even rarer is the game being good... This game ticks both boxes in spades

Game: Only good teamwork is required to complete the objective and win.

(Players be like): Generator where?  'while running into the killer' what teamwork?
*Someone dies while on hook* teammate blows up the generator giving the killer location of us.

Killer: Ez Besh 

Yes that's my first impression for this game with only 2.1 hours 90% of the times i've lost matches because of such teammates i can recommend it if buying this for fun/playing with friends otherwise just don't for the sake of your computer accessories.

356 hours Later...

My review is pretty much the same as written above and honestly i didn't think that i would've lasted THIS long and we'll see how long i can go forward with the all mighty power of ' Ē ' 

So continue?
游戏是好游戏，但是这匹配机制就是一坨屎。shit知道吗？4排两红人类车队排我一个12绿段屠夫，我还3个技能。真不知道在搞什么，别跟我说什么技不如人，都不是一个分段的，玩腻嘛？如果你觉得很正常，那我只能祝你玩什么游戏都被高分段的人戏耍。呵呵

puntos positivos :
-asesinos del cine de terror clasico 
-asesinos iconicos de videojuegos (piramid head, nemesis)
-para amantes del survivor horror y juegos en cooperativo
-para pasar unos buenos sustos con amigos 

puntos negativos :
-tiempo de espera entre partidas muy largo 
-el sistema de enparejamientos en rangos altos es injusto (pero viene de la mano con el punto 1)
-ciertos bugs en algunos mapas que dan desventajas a asesinos (eje: loop walls)  

en conclusion un juego que le pondria un 8 de calificacion. bueno pero no exelente

so friend and i have been looking for something new to play. games anymore just are not what they use to be. for a game that has 60k+ players on at a given time. we sat in the lobby for 10 minutes before it matched us with anyone. did not enjoy the experience at all.
入坑早，最近五周年回坑，一玩就停不下来。逃生者需要升级可以先玩屠夫，两边换着玩，对游戏理解也有帮助。屠夫来血点快，就是要常备降压药。生化危机dlc一出，我直接玩爆。浣熊市警察局，我永远的家。逃生者我只爱吉尔小姐姐！怪奇物语dlc 也不错，喜欢玩史蒂夫 自摸听他娇喘哈哈。史蒂夫这个角色设计的很还原剧的形象了，超爱~
看守者对我很友好 我xx谢谢你：）

Game has been out forever but only has 1 mode. Poor balancing and devs have poor understanding of the state of the game and don't listen to their community well. Many mechanics that need fixed like gen speeds, general chase mechanics, hitboxes (or lack thereof), etc. Keys are op and punish killers. Moris op and punish survivors for surviving. Literally only play with my friends because they make the game fun, not the devs or the game itself.
Fun game, didn't think I'd like it at first and debated on getting it. Once I got it I've not been able to stop playing it.

蠻刺激緊張的一款遊戲，讓你身在恐怖片的電影之中，邊修機還要按對QTE（技能檢驗）、躲過鬼的追殺...
身為惡靈古堡的粉絲，新DLC一出就買了

不過老實說，DBD對單排和新手不太友善，單排沒辦法開自訂熟悉地圖。新手則是會被玩爆，當人遛不了鬼一下就被砍倒；當鬼砍不到人還會被挑釁（沒砍到被人猛蹲＋手電筒開開關關）...要對這遊戲有一定的愛，才會繼續玩下去吧！
One of the most fun games I have ever played, feels like a slasher horror survival game and it's great
its really fun, the way its balanced you can feel like a winner every game even if you end  up losing badly in the end lol
buen juego me gusta jugar de superviviente ya que cuando viene el asesino le hago como bailecito y me lo paseo mucho rato. puros weones los que juegan de asesino
very fun and interactive. easy to learn
好玩 农场主欢迎大家再次光临1
Un juego excelente muy diferente a los que habia jugando antes.

1.当你作为逃生者，因为守尸等原因给屠夫针对死时，请不要过多抱怨.除了开挂，游戏内屠夫的一切举动都是合理的~
1.5.作为屠夫，如果不是情况特殊，尽可能不要守尸，那样会影响你的血点~
2.单边玩家还请在发表自己言论之前，还请先去对面玩一把，体验一下~
3.把杀机当作单机游戏，不要过多的在意段位，多试试有趣的技能搭配，可以适时的增加游戏寿命~
4.还请不要“微调”等一些列行为，那真的很无趣~

The amount you have to pay for things is dumb. You buy a character for 5 dollars and then if you want to customise their appearance? AT LEAST another 5 dollars, up to 15 for an outfit. No way to earn either the character or the cosmetics in-game.
Legalzin, mas com amigos é melhor ainda

MOnster SCary. GeneRator Go BEeP BooP BOOM. all around very good gamwe./
Игра в которой тебе придется ждать 10 минут самой игры, умереть за 2 минуты и снова ждать следующего матча. За убийцу понравилось больше, хотя теперь мне кажется что у меня психическое расстройство!

ceut jeux est truffais de beug en tout genre dlc trop couteux , le dlc resident évil à était mutiler , les devs sortes des skins mets régler les bug et refaire l'équilibrage des personnage ( l'esprit , nurse , oni ) sont beaucoup trop cheater si vous jouez contre eux il faut juste déco et relancer une autre games , le jeux est trés mal codé les perks qui ne fonctionne pas , les palettes qui joue au fantome , meme les map sont mal conçu , plus rien n'est fait pour les joueurs pour étre plaisant que ça soit survivant et tombé sur des tueurs qui cheat qui utilise des filtres pour étre meilleur le tunneling est la camp qui sévice et surtout ceci ceut produit dans les haut rank , puis jouer tueurs ou rien est expliqué c'est tu te démerde les pouvoir qui sont mal conçu la hachette de la huntress qui est abominable la hit box on dirait un camion,sans compter les survivant qui joue cancer qui améliore leurs fov et joue aussi avec filtres , si je peut vous donnez un conseil fuyez de ceut jeux maudit codé part les pieds ou que l'argent les intéresse et rien d'autre

我是傻逼，原价买的，第二天就打折了

The game is the most fun for those that enjoy spending more time in loading screens and queues. Also if you're a sucker for having nothing in your favor as a survivor, this is the game for you. Completely balanced. If you want to get outran in an open field with no place to hide and no where to go while you have a 10 foot monster chasing you that runs 10 mph faster than you, then you should have no complaints with this wack garbage. Oh and I almost forgot about perk cards that let you see teammates within 20 meters of you, how helpful. I wouldn't want something actually helpful.

Es un buen juego, desgraciadamente no es tan amistoso con los nuevos, ya que no te enseña a hacer mucho, pero como dicen, la práctica hace al maestro. Muchos dicen que el juego es algo desbalanceado, pero es un juego asimétrico, no va a ser justo para los 2 bandos, depende mucho de cómo jueguen todos en la partida.
新手杀鸡玩家 好玩是好玩 就是我的肝有点硬化
The game can be fun but it's incredibly grindy and the developers are horrible at communicating with their playerbase. I wouldn't recommend getting into it.
